Body:
grammar, text, result = [read_file(grammar_file + postfix) for postfix in (
    '', '.txt', '.json')]
speg = SPEG()
ast = speg.parse(grammar, text)
assert json.loads(ast.to_json()) == json.loads(result)
pytest.mark.parametrize('grammar_file', collect_files(FIXTURES_ROOT, lambda
    f: f.endswith('.peg')))
